title: The Adventure of Learning in College: An Undergraduate Guide to Productive Study
description: THE ADVENTURE OF LEARNING IN COLLEGE "is concerned not with techniques but with goals, expectations, perseptions, and values. The basic question in this text is education for what? This is an exciting little it provokes, it challenges, and, at times, it inspires. It is likely to provide an "incandescent moment" not only to the freshman, but also to the graduate student, and yes, to the instructor as well."
author: Roger H. Garrison
